publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-336 Iain Smith: Good Luck to Andrew Lemoncello—That the Parliament congratulates Andrew Lemoncello on his selection to represent the United Kingdom in the 3000m steeplechase at the World Championships in Athletics in Osaka, Japan, following his success in winning the UK/GB trial in Manchester and wishes Andrew every success in Osaka. Supported by: Brian Adam*, Elizabeth Smith*, Ross Finnie*, Karen Gillon*, Nanette Milne*, David Whitton*, John Lamont*, Mary Mulligan*, Robin Harper*, Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-336 Good Luck to Andrew Lemoncello (lodged on 2 August 2007) Jamie Stone*, Mike Pringle*
